## Overview

### This section

-   This tutorial introduces **shiny** and **shinyuieditor**, which are used to create interactive applications (dashboards) using R. These notes will incorporate ideas and techniques from all of the previous tutorials and display them in applications that allow  users to dive deeper into and answer their own questions about the data.
